## ğŸ§© ×“×•×’××ª ×©×™××•×©

```python
from il_bank_validator import validate_israeli_bank_account

if validate_israeli_bank_account(10, 936, "07869660"):
    print("Valid account!")
else:
    print("Invalid account!")
```
